Text: Summary of YK Glitches Cc find a summary of the minor YK related glitches that various business units experienced following the rollover As you can see the problems we encountered were minimal indeed Testing of less critical functions is ongoing and will continue through normal operations Enron Europe ETOL Power Station Optimizer application is not accepting data The application is used for informational purposes only and has no control functionality Operations are not affected ETOL will have the applicatio n repaired early next week London Enpower Europe deal selection criteria is not working with date criteria The application does function with deal numbers however The Houston application team is currently working on the problem London Global Products Accounting has a minor data import problem The problem does not impair daily operations Repair date is set for January Enron House Fire detection system alarm lights do not turn off following tests The problem is cosmetic only Also remote alarm systems skipped forward to the date January It is believed the problem is also cosmetic only EOTT Ticketing entry system had a minor problem which has already been repaired General ledger application has a program that displays the year The extent of the issue and whether the problem is cosmetic only is being pursued International Regions Transredes Columbia The pipeline SCADA Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition system failed shortly after midnight This means the pipeline control center is not automatically receiving pipeline information The system is used for information purposes only and has not affected operation s Enron North America ENA Enpower deal selection criteria is not working with date criteria Sa me as item two of Enron Europe ENA has already repaired the problem for North American operations Currently discussing European implementation timeline ENA SIFT application has a Microsoft Import problem This process is not critical to daily processes conducted by Global Products Same issue as Enr on Europe item three Repair date is January FacSys passing wrong date instead of todays date of to the fax machine which prints on the banner information Remediation scheduled before January Remediated three Excel macros in the noncommodity trading function

RE Contingency Floor Cc Louise Attached is the updated list Ive added your name to the Wholesale Executive Management section Thanks Andrew Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Monday September PM To Killen Faith Cc Parsons Andrew Subject RE Contingency Floor Obviously not until they give me a desk Then OK Original Message From Killen Faith Sent Monday September PM To Kitchen Louise Subject FW Contingency Floor Importance High Hi Louise Are you in agreement with these charges and which team should I apply them to trading teams vs OOC Original Message From Leschber Edie Sent Monday September PM To Killen Faith Subject FW Contingency Floor Original Message From Clemings Gwen Sent Thursday September PM To Leschber Edie Subject Contingency Floor Hi Edie I have attached two files that I received from Andrew Parsons for Enron Americas headcount on the contingency floor Per Andrew he discussed this project which will provide traders with an alternative workspace should the need arise with Louise Kitchen This expense project is being carried on Net Works books and will be allocated out to the business units using project settlement rules in the Project System module of SAP This project will cover the period September through December and should cost approximately K in total I will need a cost center or account or project etc to charge Enron Americas share for power and for gas of the costs Thank you for your prompt attention Gwen X File Gas Listxls File Power Listxls

RE Contingency Floor Cc Louise Attached is the updated list Ive added your name to the Wholesale Executive Management section Thanks Andrew Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Monday September PM To Killen Faith Cc Parsons Andrew Subject RE Contingency Floor Obviously not until they give me a desk Then OK Original Message From Killen Faith Sent Monday September PM To Kitchen Louise Subject FW Contingency Floor Importance High Hi Louise Are you in agreement with these charges and which team should I apply them to trading teams vs OOC Original Message From Leschber Edie Sent Monday September PM To Killen Faith Subject FW Contingency Floor Original Message From Clemings Gwen Sent Thursday September PM To Leschber Edie Subject Contingency Floor Hi Edie I have attached two files that I received from Andrew Parsons for Enron Americas headcount on the contingency floor Per Andrew he discussed this project which will provide traders with an alternative workspace should the need arise with Louise Kitchen This expense project is being carried on Net Works books and will be allocated out to the business units using project settlement rules in the Project System module of SAP This project will cover the period September through December and should cost approximately K in total I will need a cost center or account or project etc to charge Enron Americas share for power and for gas of the costs Thank you for your prompt attention Gwen X File Gas Listxls File Power Listxls

Telephone Security Sweep Cc completing a telephone systems audit that involved sweeping executive and executive assistant telephones and workspaces for listening devices This sweep included your telephones On Thursday November the following tests were conducted by Swailes and Associates and CTF Specialists under the supervision of Corp Security Each office was swept for radio frequency listening devices Each telephone was opened and physically inspected Each telephone line was checked for downline listening devices All executive and assistant extensions were programmatically evaluated to determine whether secondary unknown telephones were associated with the same extension No problems were found Thanks Andrew Parsons IT Compliance

Telephone Security Sweep Cc completing a telephone systems audit that involved sweeping executive and executive assistant telephones and workspaces for listening devices This sweep included your telephones On Thursday November the following tests were conducted by Swailes and Associates and CTF Specialists under the supervision of Corp Security Each office was swept for radio frequency listening devices Each telephone was opened and physically inspected Each telephone line was checked for downline listening devices All executive and assistant extensions were programmatically evaluated to determine whether secondary unknown telephones were associated with the same extension No problems were found Thanks Andrew Parsons IT Compliance

Clickpaper Review Cc IT Compliance team has been asked to conduct a process review and process development project with the Clickpaper team The immediate plan is to focus on key processes prior to the go live date of July Arthur Andersen has agreed to provide experienced personnel to assist with this effort as necessary Attached please find a draft work program of the processes we plan to focus on over the next days Under the execution section the work program identifies the priority processes and the contacts we will initiate interviews with We will begin scheduling interviews this afternoon Thanks in advance for your cooperation Andrew Parsons

YK Feb Cc approaching February which is generally regarded as the second most critical Year rollover date second only to the millennium rollover A year divisible by is not a leap year unless it is divisible by As a consequence some applications that were programmed incorrectly will believe the date is March which may cause system errors During the millennium rollover Enron encountered YK related issues only with the bottom tier of applications and embedded systems that were ranked as ordinary or low in our triage processes The problems that did arise were few and were quickly fixed This is exactly what we were planning for and is a testament to a job done exceptionally well by all In consideration of the few and minor problems Enron encountered on January our procedures for the th will be curtailed The goals for this period are to validate that all mission critical applications and embedded systems are functioning normally and to ensure that all problems are reported through the project office We are not planning to reopen the Millennium Management Center nor do we plan to operate outside of normal business hours Please ensure that each group that reported to you for the millennium rollover run through the same YK checklists for critical systems For this exercise however we anticipate them reporting back to you on an exception basis only If problems do occur the nature details and planned ready dates should be forwarded to Andrew Parsons or Bob Johansen who will report to management and monitor events Also be sure to route any inquiries from the press through the same public relations contacts that were used on January st The key contact at Corp Public Relations is Karen Denne Thank you for your cooperation Andrew

Internal Controls Presentation Cc Rick Attached please find the internal controls presentation for the audit committee report Page includes the modifications to the RAC slide Thanks Andrew
RE Presentationpst Got it Its fine Original Message From Buy Rick Sent Friday December PM To Parsons Andrew Subject Presentation Here it is I hope Rick File draftppt

FW Internal Controls presentationpst Heres the email again Original Message From Parsons Andrew Sent Thursday December AM To Buy Rick Port David Subject Internal Controls presentation Attached is the draft presentation of the internal controls component of the audit We are only planning on including the first of pages The last pages were built anticipating Andersen being involved and are included here for reference only Page is the RAC component Thanks Andrew

Internal Controls presentationpst Attached is the draft presentation of the internal controls component of the audit We are only planning on including the first of pages The last pages were built anticipating Andersen being involved and are included here for reference only Page is the RAC component Thanks Andrew
Templatepst Attached please find a template for the governance presentation The font was increased slightly for a presentation format Thanks Andrew

RE EGM Continuity Planning ListJeff Im just checking up on the list again Again please let me know if I can help Thanks Andrew Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Monday August PM To Parsons Andrew Subject RE EGM Continuity Planning List Andrew Ill get that to you this week Sorry for the delayit fell to the back burnerJeff Original Message From Parsons Andrew Sent Monday August AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject EGM Continuity Planning List Jeff I am following up on the list of names for the EGM continuity plan Do you have a revised copy If not let me know if I can help Thanks Andrew
